posts.post_content: I am confused why this card was made so weak. All that can be said about it is that it set the stage for blue instants that have a variation on the theme of "creatures your opponents control get" some lose in power until end of turn. Of course, this card's descendants like [Hysterical Blindness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hysterical Blindness) or [Turn the Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Turn the Tide) are significantly better than it.
